intro: Bournea leiophylla, commonly known as the smooth-leaf bournea, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Southeast Asia. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its simple, lance-shaped leaves that are usually smooth and glossy. It produces small, white or pale yellow flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. The fruit is a small, three-lobed capsule that contains several seeds.
